about_the_game:
Welcome to Tower of Jank, an exciting time-stop horde survival roguelike deck builder set in the mysterious tower of a powerful and unpredictable wizard, Jank. You are a brave explorer, tasked with climbing this mysterious tower to unravel its hidden secrets and unlock its ancient power. However, the journey won’t be easy—Jank’s chaotic influence seeps through every floor, altering the tower in unexpected and bizarre ways.

Key Features:

  • Time-Stop Mechanic: Gain the ability to stop time and think about your next move when you stop moving your character.
  • Unpredictable Wizardry: Jank's influence permeates everything. The tower’s layout, enemies, and even the rules of reality itself change with every playthrough. No two runs are ever the same, and you must adapt to the chaos as you face off against bizarre creatures, strange events, and ever-evolving threats.
  • Deckbuilding: Build and customize your deck as you progress through the tower. Upgrade and remove cards to find the most broken synergies.
  • Relics: Find relics that give unique synergistic effect to compliment your build or destroy them to gain permanent stats.

Discover Unique Characters:

  • Weapons Master: A true expert in all forms of weaponry. The Weapons Master wields everything from ranged and melee weapons to shields and heavy armor, adapting to any combat scenario. His strikes can inflict poison and bleeding, slowly wearing down enemies while he dominates the battlefield.
  • Mage: A brilliant spellcaster, the Mage commands elemental forces and ancient arcane knowledge. Mastering the elements, the Mage can cast devastating spells that burn, freeze, or shock enemies, causing a variety of status effects.
  • Druid: The Druid summons powerful creatures and commands them in battle. He can empower his creatures or sacrifice them for other benefits.

Can you climb to the top of the Tower of Jank and uncover the mysteries hidden within? Prepare for an adventure filled with magic, danger, and the unpredictable chaos of Jank's tower!

If you want to playtest the game join the discord! (link to the right ->)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz Processor
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 512 MB

name: Tower of Jank

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12

short_description: Tower of Jank is a time-stop horde survival roguelike deckbuilder. Collect cards, discover relics, and craft broken builds to survive relentless waves of enemies. Stop time, strategize, and climb the tower to uncover its secrets.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, German
